name: ts-tpae
description: Game Object definition system similar to ECS, consisting of things, parts, actions, and events.

scripts.build-for-publish: tsc --outDir dist && printf $(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g') > dist/version.txt
scripts.push: npm run build-for-publish && npm publish --access public
